text_block_list.text: A certain day in a certain month at the Tokyo Racecourse
The race track is busy today～! Be sure not to get lost.
Well then, let me introduce myself.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: I'm Tazuna Hayakawa, and I'm the secretary to the president of Tracen Academy, and also in charge of information!
choice_data_list: I look forward to working with you.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Yes ♪ It's an honor to meet a promising new trainer like you!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: So let's get started with the school guide.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: First of all, please take a look, the race is about to begin!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Look… can you hear it, those loud cheers!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: A race where horsegirls compete, which people all over the world love…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: It's the fanfare of the opening race, the stage of your dreams, where you and your horsegirls will be going!
